contest-event.event-date:
March 4, 1978 D Cornwall BBA Contest (Fourth Section)
Cornwall BBA Contest (Fourth Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Cornwall Brass Band Association Contest cornwall-bba-contest-fourth-section
None
City Hall, Truro, Cornwall, England, UK Prizes - 1st £17 and cup, 2nd £12 and cup, 3rd £8 and cup. 7 bands competed. 23rd annual contest.
Sept. 9, 2013, 4:26 p.m. Dec. 20, 2016, 12:12 a.m.
1 Illogan Sparnon Silver Band C. T. Bolitho
2 St Ives Youth Eric Toll
3 Gweek Silver Band D. Burley
Unknown Result City of Truro Band Reg Little
Unknown Result Launceston Town Band Nick Chadd
Unknown Result Penzance Silver E. T. Thomas
Unknown Result St Newlyn East A. Verran
